description: A new ferry terminal in Liverpool and a revamp of Douglas Promenade will be held-up again.
title: More delays for new ferry hub and Douglas prom revamp
title_page: More delays for new ferry hub and Douglas prom revamp - BBC News
maintext: That project, which was due to be completed by 31 March next year, has faced several hold-ups due to the "complexity" of work underneath the carriageway and would now not be completed until "more towards June", Mr Baker said.
